title: FirstMeet
body:
You're LATE!
Well, anyway. You need to start working right now. Lots of clients summoning lately.
You know the drill: Just place the required items in the summoning circle.
You can pick up the items with [SPACE]
Drop them with [LEFT MOUSE BUTTON] and if you're in a hurry, you can throw them with [RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON]
You can check your requirements for the summoning at any time with [E]
And when you have everything in the circles pick your phone with [Q] and click the button to finish.
Remember each smaller circle can have ONLY ONE ingredient, and you also can't be standing on them when you finish.
Now get to work! I can't get richer if you're lazy.
.....

title: AfterLvl1
body:
Well, you're not fired.
Yet.
You know there are 200 demons outside waiting for you to fail and take your place for half the pay, right?
.....

title: AfterLvl2
body:
If you work hard enough and hold true the values of our company, I will be able to buy a new yatch in a couple of months. Go team!
.....

title: AfterLvl3
body:
We are behind schedule! And by we, I mean you.
But don't worry, enough pizza shall be provided for when you are working overtime, it is for the greater good (mine).
.....

title: Random1
body:
It looks like next week's chicken deliveries will be delayed... after the bridge over the lava river has melted...
Although I can put some souls to make a human bridge to pass with the cargo.

title: Random2
body:
I called the supplier to ask them why the prices of boilers had increased out of nowhere... They started saying something about "floating exchange rates"....
I don't understand what swimming has to do with prices... I don't even swim.
I have employees to do that for me.

title: Random3
body:
You know I'm a fair boss, and I need to treat everyone equally.
So it is only fair that you work some extra hours tonight, just like your fellow coworkers, right?

title: Random4
body: We're in the middle of a paradigm shift. The company needs to expand it's portfolio to endure the new challenges so we may sail this in a way that aligns with our vision and values.

title: Random5
body: Hey, I'm calling to inform that we scheduled a meeting for 5:50 PM, in order to schedule the Cross-Skill Conflict-Resolution team training.

title: AfterLvl4
body:
Well, congratulations! You're making me richer than ever!
Just one more summon and you can be promoted to manager.
You will enjoy even more work and responsibilities! Good Job!
Now for the last summoning...
......
